Articles.Content:
So, I made a race car and an untuned version. It has rockets or it can use its own wheels. Under wheel power it can reach 23 m/s.

Our first race car, The Kan Am Racing Kar.

Action Groups:

1: Toggles spoiler. Generates lift at rear(use at high speeds)

2: Toggles front wing. Glues front of car to the ground(use at startup)

3: Toggles side wings. Increases grip in turns.

We have an untuned and tuned car. The action groups only apply to the tuned car.\

[https://www./folder/kpsceia7e7gei/KSP_Racers](https://www./folder/kpsceia7e7gei/KSP_Racers)

Sorry, no pictures:(

The stock kar is untuned, the racing kar is tuned.

Have fun!

Top speed of 60 m/s before wheels burst.
i have no pictures because imgur decided to stop working for the hour. I will upload pics tommorow.
